hanzi-su-wiki:
麗

Значения

Красивый, изящный

Мнемоника

Оленьи 鹿 глаза (сверху) считались образцом красоты.

Варианты

丽, 䴡

heisig_chinese_memo: You put up a couple of paintings but your wife says they're both just ordinary so you get a deer painting and she says it's lovely! &nbsp
heisig_constituent: lovely, one, ceiling, mediocre, deer, cave, antlers, compare, ceiling2, mediocre2, compare2
heisig_story: The painting of a deer itself with its form and color is enough to fill the bill for an image of something lovely. But to give a bit of contrast, we see two mediocre drawings from a later age on two patches of ceiling above. Note that the drop in mediocre has been lengthened somewhat and the second stroke drawn down straight.
koohiiStory1: The anthropologist made an exact deer painting from the cave ceiling on the ceiling of his house. Too bad they´re both mediocre. All his wife could say was, "How...lovely.".
koohiiStory2: Lovely bambi.... pictographe : just take a look at those innocent open eyes (part 1 it´s not more far fetched than seeing mediocre in it) with thin eyebrows what a lovely deer ...(part 2).
jp_example_words: 奇麗(きれい): pretty, clean, nice, tidy, beautiful, fair
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you know the radical meaning lovely, you know the kanji meaning lovely as well!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You know what would make learning this radical lovely? Studying your radicals.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: "Lovely" is the name of my ray (れい) gun. It's more lovely than any other thing.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Try to imagine feeling this way about your ray gun. It's so lovely.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 广 (скала с точкой), 比 (сравнивать), 鹿 (олень)
Ru_trainchinese:

lí: (графема) используется в некоторых топонимах
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the deer's (鹿) paws (丽) are lovely
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A man put a picture of his lovely wife on the wall high up towards the ceiling. See her straight yet beautiful smile? Oh, he accidentally hung it upside-down though.
humanum_full_description_en:
A golden inscription is like a deer with double horns, with special emphasis on the beautiful pair of antlers on the head of a deer. The original meaning is two, a pair, and a pair. "Little Erya. "Guang Yan": "Li, two also." "Yu Pian": "Li, I also." Derived from the beautiful Li Jiao, " Li " means beauty and beauty.

In order to describe a thing, ancient characters often draw all things connected to or related to the thing, such as the " eyebrows " that represent eyebrows, and the eyes are also drawn. The word " li " means a pair of horns, and the body of a deer is also drawn to clearly show that the antlers are painted. The ancient and seal scripts of "Shuowen" should be the corruption of the antlers.

The oracle bone inscriptions indicate numbers, Zhou Yuan Oracle H11:123 "Qi Li", "Poetry. Daya. Wen Wang: "The grandson of Shang, his beauty is not billion?" Zheng Xuan's note: "Li, count also." (Xu Zhongshu)

Bronze writing is used as a person's name. I also see the word "liban", which is a kind of ornament. The classic is called "鞶li", which is now a minority purse, hung on the shoulder and hangs down (Guo Moruo).

"Said Wen": "Li, travel. Deer's nature, you must travel if you are in a hurry. From deer, Li Sheng. "Li Pina". Cover deer skin. 𠀙, ancient Chinese. 𠧥, Li characters in seal script." Duan Yucai's note: "Two phases attached rules are Li", "Two intermediaries are also called Li."

" Lai " and " off " connected, "Book of Changes" Gua from there, " from the " Silk Book this as " Lo " Wang Qin Jian "return to Tibet" as " beautiful ." "Tuan Biography": "from, Lai also." Qin Jian " Korea " and read as " suffering " this means suffer, "Shuihudi Jane. Japanese book A. "Zejiao": "Ling the people do not want to be beautiful (sorry)". Li reads as suffering, "Jiyun": "Suffering, suffering." "Book. "Tangguo": "Suffering from its murder, you can endure the poison." Kong's biography: "Suffering, be." "Book. Hong Fan: "Not to blame." "Kun Xue Ji Wen" primer "Book of mass communications," " suffer " as " Li " (Wang Hui).
humanum_short_description_en: A golden inscription is like a deer with double horns, with a special emphasis on the beautiful pair of antlers on the head of a deer.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文象一隻鹿有雙角之形，特別強調鹿頭上的一對美麗的鹿角，取義於麗角成雙成對，本義是兩個、一雙、偶。《小爾雅．廣言》：「麗，兩也。」《玉篇》：「麗，偶也。」由漂亮的麗角引申，「麗」有美麗、美好之意。

　　古文字為了描畫一事物，往往把與該事物相連或相關的事物都畫出來，如為表示眉毛之「眉」，把眼睛也畫出來。「麗」字以一對麗角表示一雙之意，把鹿的身體也畫出來，才能清楚顯示所畫的是鹿角，《說文》古文和篆文應該是鹿角之形的訛變。

　　甲骨文表示數，周原甲骨文H11:123「其麗」，《詩．大雅．文王》：「商之孫子，其麗不億？」鄭玄注：「麗，數也。」(徐中舒)

　　金文用作人名。又見「麗般」一詞，是一種佩飾，典籍作「鞶厲」，形如今少數民族之荷包，掛在肩上而垂下來(郭沫若)。

　　《說文》：「麗，旅行也。鹿之性，見食急則必旅行。从鹿、丽聲。《禮》：『麗皮納聘』。蓋鹿皮也。𠀙，古文。𠧥，篆文麗字。」段玉裁注：「兩相附則為麗」、「兩而介其間亦曰麗」。

　　「麗」與「離」相通，《周易》有離卦，「離」馬王堆帛書本作「羅」，王家台秦簡《歸藏》作「麗」。《彖傳》：「離，麗也。」秦簡「麗」又讀為「罹」，表示遭受，《睡虎地秦簡．日書甲．詰咎》：「令民勿麗凶央(殃)」。麗讀為罹，《集韻》：「罹，遭也。」《書．湯誥》：「罹其凶害，弗忍荼毒。」孔氏傳：「罹，被。」《書．洪範》：「不罹于咎」。《困學紀聞》引《尚書大傳》「罹」作「麗」(王輝)。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文象一隻鹿有雙角之形，特別強調鹿頭上的一對美麗的鹿角，取義於麗角成雙成對，本義是兩個、一雙、偶。

麗字的基本解释

麗
lì
见“丽”。

麗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》郎計切，去霽，來。］
亦作“婯1”。“丽1”的繁体字。
(1)偶；成对。
(2)并驾。
(3)结伴而行。
(4)附着；依附。
(5)系；缠缚。
(6)连接。
(7)射中；正着目标。
(8)施；加。
(9)谓依法、按事实施加刑罚。
(10)经过。
(11)跨越。参见“麗級”。
(12)匹；品配。
(13)椽柱之类。
(14)美好；光采焕发。
(15)光华。
(16)通“厲”。形容声音高亢。
(17)观看。
(18)书法用语。
(19)汉县名。属琅邪郡。见《汉书·地理志上》。
(20)姓。
[②]［lí］
［《廣韻》回支切，平支，來。］
亦作“婯2”。“丽2”的繁体字。
(1)见“麗2黄”、“魚麗陣”。
(2)见“麗2廔”。
(3)通“罹”。遭遇；落入。
(4)通“罹”。忧愁。
[③]［lǐ］
［《集韻》里弟切，上薺，來。］
亦作“婯3”。“丽3”的繁体字。
数目。

麗字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鹿字部】　麗； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1510第31
〔古文〕??麗?【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】郞計切【正韻】力霽切，?音隷。【說文】旅行也。鹿之性，見食急，則必旅行。又【司馬相如·大人賦】駕應龍象輿之蠖略委麗兮。【師古註】行步進止貌。　又【玉篇】偶也。【易·兌卦】麗澤兌。【註】麗，猶連也。【周禮·夏官·校人】麗馬一圉。【註】兩馬也。【又】束帛麗皮。【註】兩皮也。【史世紀】太昊始制嫁娶麗皮爲禮。【釋義】麗，偶數也。　又【玉篇】好也。【廣韻】美也。【楚辭·招魂】被文服纖麗而不奇些。又【前漢·東方朔傳】以道德爲麗。　又【玉篇】數也。【詩·大雅】商之孫子，其麗不億。　又【廣韻】著也。【左傳·宣十二年】射糜麗龜。【註】麗，著也。　又【正韻】附也。【易·離卦】離，麗也。日月麗乎天，百穀草木麗乎土。又【禮·王制】郵罰麗于事。【註】麗，附也。過人罰人當各附於其事，不可假他以喜怒。　又繫也。【禮·祭義】祭之日，君牽牲，旣入廟門，麗于?。【註】麗，猶繫也。　又【玉篇】華綺也。【正韻】華也。【書·畢命】敝化奢麗，萬世同

[①]［lì］
["Guang Yun" Lang Ji cut, go to Ji, come. ]
Also known as "婯1". Traditional characters for "丽1".
(1) Even; in pairs.
(2) Parallel driving.
(3) Go together.
(4) Attachment; attachment.
(5) Department; entanglement.
(6) Connection.
(7) Hit; hit the target.
(8) Shi; add.
(9) It means to impose penalties in accordance with the law and facts.
(10) Go through.
(11) Leap over. See "Li class".
(12) Horse; product matching.
(13) Rafters and the like.
(14) Beautiful; radiant.
(15) Guanghua.
(16) Through "li". Describes a high-pitched voice.
(17) Watch.
(18) Calligraphy terms.
(19) Name of Han County. It belongs to Langxie County. See "Book of Han Geography".
(20) Last name.
[②]［lí］
["Guangyun" back to branch and cut, flat branch, come. ]
Also known as "婯2". Traditional characters for "丽2".
(1) See "Li 2 Yellow" and "Yu Li Zhen".
(2) See "Li 2 廔".
(3) Through "suffering". Encounter; fall into.
(4) Through "suffering". sad.
[③] [lǐ]
[In "Jiyun", brother cut, on the water chestnut, come. ]
Also known as "婯3". Traditional characters for "丽3".

Radicals: 麗  (lovely)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you know the radical meaning lovely, you know the kanji meaning lovely as well!
You know what would make learning this radical lovely? Studying your radicals.
Reading Mnemonic
"Lovely" is the name of my ray (れい) gun. It's more lovely than any other thing.
Try to imagine feeling this way about your ray gun. It's so lovely.
